definition[0]: someone who is on the rebound is upset or confused because their romantic relationship has just ended
example[0]: He first met me when I was on the rebound, after splitting up with Mark.
definition[1]: a ball that is on the rebound has just hit something and is moving back through the air
example[1]: I caught the ball on the rebound.
definition[2]: something that is on the rebound is starting to increase or improve again
example[2]: The market seems to be on the rebound.
